description: This file defines an Android Fragment called IndiceFragment, which manages a UI screen with three call-to-action buttons and a menu button. It handles focus navigation via DPAD keys, button click events to navigate to different prototypes or instructions, and inflates a specific layout. The class includes methods for setting up focus transitions and handling user interactions.
